As some of you may know already, we have switched to SourceBans. Our new website for bans can be found at http://nnjg.site.nfoservers.com/sb/

Now, because of the switch, you soon won't be able to use any power you may have. Why? Because we are getting rid of ULX. We're using SourceMod, which means you need to PM me your steam id, current EMail, and a password for your SourceBans account before having any access. 
Currently, you all still have ULX power, but by the end of the week, you will lose it. Hopefully, in time with a host change to avoid crashes.

-Ben
